aliens.title: Wildmutt
aliens.description: Wildmutt is a quadrupedal alien with razor sharp teeth and incredible sense of smell. He can't speak, but can understand human speech.

aliens.title: Four Arms
aliens.description: Four Arms is a humanoid alien with four arms, superhuman strength and durability. He can also shoot energy blasts from his hands

aliens.title: Grey Matter
aliens.description: Grey Matter is a small alien with a big brain and intelligence. He can also climb walls and ceilings using suction cups on his hands and feet.

aliens.title: Heatblast
aliens.description: Heatblast is a pyrokinetic alien with the ability to generate and control fire. He can also fly using the jets of fire coming out of his feet.

aliens.title: Diamondhead
aliens.description: Diamondhead is a crystalline alien with diamond-hard skin and the ability to project diamond-like shards from his body.

aliens.title: XLR8
aliens.description: XLR8 is a Kineceleran alien with incredible speed and agility. He can also generate powerful shockwaves with his speed.

aliens.title: Upgrade
aliens.description: Upgrade is a Galvanic Mechamorph alien with the ability to merge with and control technology. He can also generate powerful energy beams from his eyes.

aliens.title: Cannonbolt
aliens.description: Cannonbolt is a Arburian Pelarota alien with a nearly indestructible armor and the ability to curl into a ball for protection or to roll at high speeds.

aliens.title: Ghostfreak
aliens.description: Ghostfreak is a Ectonurite alien with the ability to phase through objects and become intangible. He can also generate powerful energy blasts from his hands.

aliens.title: Ripjaws
aliens.description: Ripjaws is a Piscciss Volann alien with the ability to breathe underwater and razor-sharp teeth. He can also extend his jaw to bite through virtually anything.
